MCQ: Who introduced the earliest machine learning model in the 1950s?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Arthur Samuel | c: Walter Pitts | d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What was the name of the experimental 'learning machine' developed by Raytheon Company in the early 1960s?
Choices: a: Cybertron | b: Megatron | c: Optimus | d: Bumblebee

MCQ: What are the two main objectives of modern-day machine learning?
Choices: a: Classify data and make predictions | b: Analyze data and make predictions | c: Classify data and analyze data | d: Analyze data and store data

MCQ: Who proposed the early mathematical models of neural networks?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Arthur Samuel | c: Walter Pitts and Warren McCulloch | d: Tom M. Mitchell

MCQ: What was the main success of 'connectionism' in the mid-1980s?
Choices: a: The reinvention of backpropagation | b: The invention of artificial neural networks | c: The development of reinforcement learning | d: The creation of expert systems
